info_block.text:
<b>[Feature Parity] Max Proxies + SharedFlows per Environment

Under the Subscription 2021 plan, Apigee X has a limit of 60 Proxies + SharedFlow (with maximum of 50 for deployed proxies) per environment.

<iu>Workaround:
Ensure you are entitled to Apigee X via a Subscription 2024 contract. Or, Depending on your implementation, sharding the proxies and sharedflows to multiple environments to make the limit could be a workaround. Please be aware of environment-level properties before doing this (i.e. cache)
